Package fr.escape.app

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Overlay
    A common Overlay between each Game Screen.
    Screen
    Represents one of many game screens, like main menu, or settings etc...
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    Core Engine for Escape-IR This class initialize all necessary components for the Game.
    Configuration
    Configuration Object for Graphics and Activity.
    Foundation
    Foundation is a Wrapper which contains all Core Components for the Game All Components are accessible anywhere after Activity is created.
    Game
    A class which delegates rendering to a Screen.
    Graphics
    This class is a layer for AWT and Zen2 Library.
    Input
    A Wrapper for User Input.
